name: should handle player_target_share_from_plays with a where clause
description: Test case for should handle player_target_share_from_plays with a where clause
expected_query: with "t7016a4eb3ca6830e254e6e0537260d65" as (select COALESCE(trg_pid) as pid, SUM(CASE WHEN trg_pid IS NOT NULL THEN 1 ELSE 0 END) as trg_from_plays from "nfl_plays" where not "play_type" = 'NOPL' and "nfl_plays"."year" in (2023) and "nfl_plays"."seas_type" in ('REG') and "nfl_plays"."dwn" in (3) group by COALESCE(trg_pid) having SUM(CASE WHEN trg_pid IS NOT NULL THEN 1 ELSE 0 END) >= '15'), "t334d1d18d6572804e52aad88c061d2dd" as (select "pg"."pid", ROUND(100.0 * COUNT(CASE WHEN nfl_plays.trg_pid = pg.pid THEN 1 ELSE NULL END) / NULLIF(SUM(CASE WHEN trg_pid IS NOT NULL THEN 1 ELSE 0 END), 0), 2) as trg_share_from_plays from "nfl_plays" inner join "player_gamelogs" as "pg" on "nfl_plays"."esbid" = "pg"."esbid" and "nfl_plays"."off" = "pg"."tm" where not "play_type" = 'NOPL' and ("trg_pid" is not null) and "nfl_plays"."year" in (2023) and "nfl_plays"."seas_type" in ('REG') and "nfl_plays"."dwn" in (3) group by "pg"."pid"), "te4e0b9f3b474147853625688b0c339d2" as (select "pg"."pid", ROUND(100.0 * COUNT(CASE WHEN nfl_plays.trg_pid = pg.pid THEN 1 ELSE NULL END) / NULLIF(SUM(CASE WHEN trg_pid IS NOT NULL THEN 1 ELSE 0 END), 0), 2) as trg_share_from_plays from "nfl_plays" inner join "player_gamelogs" as "pg" on "nfl_plays"."esbid" = "pg"."esbid" and "nfl_plays"."off" = "pg"."tm" where not "play_type" = 'NOPL' and ("trg_pid" is not null) and "nfl_plays"."year" in (2023) and "nfl_plays"."seas_type" in ('REG') and "nfl_plays"."qtr" in (1, 2) group by "pg"."pid") select "player"."pid", "t7016a4eb3ca6830e254e6e0537260d65"."trg_from_plays" AS "trg_from_plays_0", player.fname, player.lname, "t334d1d18d6572804e52aad88c061d2dd"."trg_share_from_plays" AS "trg_share_from_plays_0", "te4e0b9f3b474147853625688b0c339d2"."trg_share_from_plays" AS "trg_share_from_plays_1", "player"."pos" from "player" inner join "t7016a4eb3ca6830e254e6e0537260d65" on "t7016a4eb3ca6830e254e6e0537260d65"."pid" = "player"."pid" left join "t334d1d18d6572804e52aad88c061d2dd" on "t334d1d18d6572804e52aad88c061d2dd"."pid" = "player"."pid" left join "te4e0b9f3b474147853625688b0c339d2" on "te4e0b9f3b474147853625688b0c339d2"."pid" = "player"."pid" group by "t7016a4eb3ca6830e254e6e0537260d65"."trg_from_plays", player.fname, player.lname, "t334d1d18d6572804e52aad88c061d2dd"."trg_share_from_plays", "te4e0b9f3b474147853625688b0c339d2"."trg_share_from_plays", "player"."pid", "player"."lname", "player"."fname", "player"."pos" order by 5 DESC NULLS LAST, "player"."pid" asc limit 500
